Our Locations

Three locations in Queensland

We support people to live abundantly in our three locations across south-east Queensland: Janoah Gardens at Manly, The Plains at Eight Mile Plains and Beth Eden at Graceville.

The Plains

The Plains

Known for its beautiful, home-like environment

The Plains Located in the heart of Brisbane's south at Eight Mile Plains: just a five-minute drive from Westfield Garden City and close to a number of motorway links with a council bus stop at our door.

The Plains offers independent living units, services apartments, aged care and secure dementia care.

See The Plains
Janoah Gardens

Janoah Gardens

Fresh sea breezes and bayside living

Be part of a loving, close-knit community at Janoah Gardens in Manly West.

Janoah Gardens offers independent living units, serviced apartments and aged care.

See Janoah Gardens
Beth Eden

Beth Eden

Lush, leafy riverside location

Be part of a large, warm family at Beth Eden in the south-western suburb of Gracevilleâ€”five minutes from Indooroopilly shopping centre and 600 metres from shops and public transport.

Beth Eden offers independent living units, aged care and secure dementia care.

See Beth Eden
